rules.description: Essential Editing: Copy, Cut, Paste, Undo, Redo, Select All (PC Keyboard)
File Operations: Save, New, Open, Print, Close, Quit (PC Keyboard)
Text Formatting: Bold, Italic, Underline (PC Keyboard)
Browser: Tabs, Refresh, Address Bar, Bookmark, Find (PC Keyboard)
Window Management: Alt+F4 → Quit, Alt+Tab → App Switcher (PC Keyboard)
Text Navigation: Home/End, Ctrl+Arrows, Word Delete (PC Keyboard)
System: Ctrl+Shift+Esc → Force Quit Dialog (PC Keyboard)
Linux-style clipboard shortcuts: Ctrl+C/V/Shift+V behave like Command shortcuts on macOS (Google Chrome only)
